messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: WE CALL THIS A DIFFICULTY TWEAK

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Honkmother Base in Space 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division Server Room.
